ontology.name: scientifical_service_ontology
ontology.description: Comprehensive ontology for scientific services: R&D projects, laboratory operations, assays & experiments, samples & inventory, computational analysis, data management (FAIR), quality/compliance (GLP/GCLP/ISO 17025/GxP), biosafety/ethics, clinical & animal research support, procurement/assets, customer contracts/SLA, reporting/publication, sustainability and security.
